headline: Carrier Completes Strategic Portfolio Transformation with Closing of $3B Sale of its Commercial and Residential Fire Business
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced it has completed the sale of its Commercial and Residential Fire business to an affiliate of Lone Star Funds for an enterprise value of $3 billion.
